reviews.review:
OMFG!!! Amazing!!! The only thing that frustrates me is I'll have to wait almost a year to see how this will turn out!!!! 
To me, this is an incredibly well put together movie!
Best Marvel movie yet...not a single dull moment.
Darth Vader who’s that? Thanos is the biggest badass villain in movie history. This movie blows my mind. the fight scenes are amazing and it Connects all 18 films perfectly
Absolutely amazing non stop action from start to finish counting the days until the next one

What a stupid way to end a movie!! why would you go and do that kind of a an ending!! did you guys just get lazy go out and hire bunch of DC writers to complete end this.  It was such a poorly written ending that I am not sure I want to see any future Marvals flicks.

Seriously what was the purpose of that ending!! The only away to fix this is by messing with timelines!! who is interested in doing so.  Or worst sticking to this and what expect us to still watch future Dr. Strange movies!! Black Panther!! GOG!! after this stunt!! 
What was the point!!!

I'm speechless, every 5 minutes of the film i was either laughing, crying or shocked. All the twists and turns were so unexpected and all the characters interactions with each other work so perfectly. This is one of the best MCU movies I've ever seen.

An incredible accomplishment and one everyone should enjoy even if it's just out of respect for this cinematic landmark. Well done the Russo brothers, well done marvel and thank you for delivering your promises.
Really terrible. A video game to collect stones for three hours!!! Clearly a money grabber by Disney. How could they follow Black panther with this? Gosh... #wakandaforever
One of the best marvel movies. Well acted. Brush up on your characters to understand what’s going on. Definitely worth seeing

I immensely enjoyed this film, and so I'll do the 'good' first. The pacing is good, lessons have been learned since Ultron and the characters are segmented, which means they all get some arc (largely, rhere are exceptions). Hemsworth is wonderful as Thor, he's taken that energy from Ragnarok and carried straight on, he's funny, self deprecating and about all, badass. 

This is a fun and exciting film that's a pleasure on the eye, and I would say does justice to it's comic book roots.

The bad - potentially is a little long, and the plot is very formulaic (not a bad thing imo, but could irritate some), the cast is still very big and screen time for some characters is very limited.
